description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION, PROPOSED CONVERSION OF ROOF SPACE AND ERECTION OF REAR ROOF DORMER EXTENSION AND ADDITION OF 3 X ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house comprising the erection of a single storey rear extension within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house comprising the erection of a rear roof extension within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house comprising the installation of 3 x rooflights to the front roof slope within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
